name: INATUREWATCH FOUNDATION
briefDescription: iNaturewatch Foundation is a charitable trust (reg. E-1074 dt. 13 May  2016) working in the field of urban biodiversity across the country since 2014. We aim at developing environmentally sensitive citizens by engaging them with the environment through our various innovative initiatives.    1. FOCUS AREAS:Urban BiodiversityMangrove ConservationButterfly Conservation2. APPROACHES:Online CoursesNature WalksSponsored walksNature CampsWorkshops3. TARGET GROUP:Students TeachersNature EnthusiastsCorporates
